home.title: L'embrace | Handcrafted Jewelry & Accessories
home.description: Discover elegant handcrafted jewelry and accessories at L'embrace. Unique pieces made with love and attention to detail. Shop our exclusive collection.

products.title: Shop Jewelry & Accessories | L'embrace
products.description: Browse our collection of handcrafted jewelry and accessories. Find unique earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and more at L'embrace.

about.title: About Us | L'embrace
about.description: Learn about L'embrace, our passion for handcrafted jewelry, and the story behind our unique creations. Elegance in every detail.

contact.title: Contact Us | L'embrace
contact.description: Get in touch with L'embrace. We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message about our handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

cart.title: Shopping Cart | L'embrace
cart.description: Review your shopping cart at L'embrace. Complete your order for handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

favorites.title: My Favorites | L'embrace
favorites.description: Your saved favorite items at L'embrace. View and manage your wishlist of handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

payment.title: Checkout | L'embrace
payment.description: Complete your purchase at L'embrace. Secure checkout for your handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

paymentSuccess.title: Order Confirmed | L'embrace
paymentSuccess.description: Thank you for your order at L'embrace. Your handcrafted jewelry is on its way.

orders.title: My Orders | L'embrace
orders.description: View your order history at L'embrace.

login.title: Login | L'embrace
login.description: Sign in to your L'embrace account to manage your orders and favorites.

register.title: Create Account | L'embrace
register.description: Create an account at L'embrace to save your favorites and track your orders.

verify.title: Verify Your Email | L'embrace
verify.description: Check your email inbox to verify your L'embrace account.

confirmation.title: Email Confirmation | L'embrace
confirmation.description: Confirming your L'embrace account email address.

profile.title: My Profile | L'embrace
profile.description: Manage your L'embrace account settings and view your order history.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password | L'embrace
resetPassword.description: Create a new password for your L'embrace account.

login.title: Admin Login | L'embrace
login.description: Sign in to the L'embrace admin panel.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard | L'embrace
dashboard.description: Manage your L'embrace store from the admin dashboard.

orders.title: Orders | Admin | L'embrace
orders.description: View and manage all orders in the L'embrace admin panel.

footer.tagline: Elegance in every detail â€“ handcrafted for you.

empty.title: No favorites yet
empty.description: Start browsing our products and add items to your favorites by clicking the heart icon.

noProducts.title: No products found
noProducts.description: We couldn't find any products matching your search criteria. Try adjusting your search terms or filters to find what you're looking for.

product.soldOut: Sorry, this item is currently sold out
product.maxItems: You have already added the maximum available quantity to your cart
product.quantityAdjusted: Quantity adjusted to maximum available stock

form.validationError: Please complete all required fields correctly.

payment.saveAddress: Save this address to my account
payment.orderError: An error occurred while processing your order. Please try again later.

success.title: Thank you for your order!
success.message: Your order has been successfully received and is being processed.

confirmation.title: Confirmation email
confirmation.description: You will receive a confirmation email within a few minutes with all the details of your order.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: We are processing your order and preparing it for shipment.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.description: You will receive an email once your package has been shipped with tracking information.

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.message: A problem occurred while processing your payment.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., user{'@'}example.com)

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

name.tooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long
name.tooLong: Name must be less than 50 characters
name.invalid: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

validation.minLength: {field} must be at least {min} characters long

general.title: Something went wrong
general.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again.

network.title: Connection error
network.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

products.title: Unable to load products
products.message: We couldn't load the products. Please try again.

product.title: Unable to load product
product.message: We couldn't load this product. It may have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.

favorites.title: Unable to load favorites
favorites.message: We couldn't load your favorites. Please try again.

toast.messageSent: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
toast.apiError: Failed to send message. Please try again.

contact.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
contact.validationError: Please complete all required fields correctly.
contact.apiError: Could not send your message. Please try again later.

empty.title: No orders yet
empty.description: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start shopping to see your orders here.

auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

form.validationError: Please complete all required fields correctly.

login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
login.error: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
login.notVerified: Email address has not been verified. Please check your inbox.
login.adminNotAllowed: Admin accounts cannot login here. Please use the admin portal.
login.resendError: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successMessage: We've sent you a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.userNotFound: No account found with this email address.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidMessage: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.error: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
resetPassword.tokenExpired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join us and start your shopping journey
register.successMessage: Your account has been created. You can now sign in.
register.error: Could not create account. Please try again.

verify.title: Check Your Email
verify.subtitle: We've sent you a verification email to complete your registration.
verify.instructions: Please click the link in the email to verify your account. Once verified, you'll be able to sign in.
verify.tip1: Check your spam or junk folder
verify.tip2: Make sure the email address above is correct
verify.resendError: Failed to resend email. Please try again.
verify.alreadyVerified: Your email is already verified. You can now sign in.

confirmation.successMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
confirmation.invalidMessage: This verification link is invalid or has already been used. Please request a new verification email.
confirmation.expiredMessage: This verification link has expired. Please register again to receive a new verification email.
confirmation.errorMessage: Something went wrong while verifying your email. Please try again.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.confirmDeleteAddress: Are you sure you want to delete this address?

login.title: Admin Access
login.subtitle: Sign in with your administrator credentials
login.success: Successfully logged in to admin panel!
login.error: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
login.notVerified: Email address has not been verified.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to your admin dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Here's an overview of your store. More features are coming soon to help you manage products, orders, and customers.

info.title: Admin Panel Under Development
info.message: This admin panel is currently being developed. Product management, order tracking, and customer management features will be available soon.

orders.title: Orders
orders.subtitle: View and manage all customer orders
orders.errorMessage: There was an error fetching the orders. Please try again.
orders.emptyMessage: When customers place orders, they will appear here.
orders.noResultsMessage: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
orders.orderNotFoundDesc: The order you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
